channel.title: Pingshan Art Musuem
channel.description: Recent content on Pingshan Art Musuem

item.title: synchronicity
item.description: Coined synchronicity by the Swiss psychologist Carl Gustav Jung (1875-1961), contemplations on meaningful coincidences and timelessness are reflected upon at Synchronicity, the first contemporary art exhibition of Pingshan Art Museum.

item.title: Four Seasons Salon-Fall: Action Imagination
item.description: Four Seasons Salon, an academic salon initiated and hosted by the Pingsan Art Museum and co-curated by Da Bian Lu, an art media platform, who will be hosting the recurring event throughout four seasons.ã€‚
